name: Quasar
description:
I appreciate your precious time and mine . That's why, i contribute this real time saver useful package.

For your reference please don't mind to check this blog:

https://twentytwopaths.wordpress.com/2018/04/01/quasar-revit-dynamo-package
contents:
ElementSelector - Select element by category or parameter inputs ..., FamilyInstanceByTypeName - A type name or comma separated type names to collect family instances., FilterSelectAndDelete - Select filter elements and delete in one shot ..., GetElementFromLinkDocument - Collect elements from link document by category and document., GetLinkDocument - Get all link document. Each list contains ,

      [0] Name of Link Document (String)
      [1] Link Document (Document)
, ReloadAllLinkDocument - Reload all link document from their saved path (directory)., SelectElementByParameter - Elements selection by given parameter name and value.
Numeric Operator - ">" , "<" , ">=" , "<=" , "="
String Operator - "begins with" , "contains" , "ends with" , "equals", ViewPortAlignment - Views arrange and align on sheets based on template sheet view ports position and location., ViewSelector - Select views by check boxes
